articles.title: No plans of divesting BPCL, focus on energy transition: Minister Hardeep Singh Puri - Moneycontrol
articles.description: On May 26, the government said that it has called off the ongoing process of strategic disinvestment of BPCL. The government said that the plan would be reinitiated after review.
